sentences.sContent: The story is about Jane Austin , the author of "Pride and Prejudice".
sentences.sCn: 这部电影讲述的是《傲慢与偏见》的作者简·奥斯汀的故事。

sentences.sContent: In Jane Austin's time, when men and women lived in separate worlds, their primary attraction to each other was romantic and/or sexual.
sentences.sCn: 在简奥斯汀的时代，男人和女人生活在各自的世界里，他们对于彼此的吸引只能发生在浪漫/性这方面。

sentences.sContent: This is the second book (that) I have read written by Jane Austin.
sentences.sCn: 这是我读过的简·奥斯汀的第二本书。
